name: E2E Multi-Channel Campaign Generator
description: Demo workflow: Input → Agent (strategy) → Prompt → Agent (copy) → Output. Generates platform-specific ad copy from campaign brief.

data.campaign_brief:
Product: Arlo Total Security Bundle (3x Pro 5 cameras + Video Doorbell)
Target: Homeowners 35-55, suburban, families with kids, security-conscious
Key Features: 2K HDR video, 160° view, color night vision, 2-way audio, person/vehicle/package detection, no monthly fees
Promotion: Holiday Bundle - Save $200 + Free 3-month Arlo Secure trial
Channels: Meta, Google Ads, Email to existing customers
Brand Voice: Reassuring, protective, premium quality (not fear-based)

config.system_prompt: You are a campaign strategist for home security products. Read this campaign brief and identify the 3 most compelling selling points for the target audience. Explain why each matters to suburban families with kids. Be concise but insightful.

parameters.system_prompt:
You are an expert multi-channel advertising copywriter. Using these strategic insights and the original brief, create platform-specific ad copy. Keep the reassuring, protective tone—avoid fear-based language.

Brief: {{campaign_brief}}

Strategy: {{agent_strategy}}

Format your response as:
META ADS (125 char primary text, use emoji sparingly):
GOOGLE SEARCH AD (Headline + Description):
EMAIL SUBJECT (existing customers, 50 char):

config.query: Generate the multi-channel ad copy now.
